projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I've developed and collaborated on.

list.title: Alegator
list.details: Alegator allows you to create, manage, and participate in debate tournaments, including real-time round, participant, and leaderboard management. Designed to offer a fluid experience to organizers, judges, and debaters.

list.title: ChobekaBlogs
list.description: Panamanian blog-style platform for sharing memes.
list.details: System with social login, rich editor, comments, data export, and background tasks powered by Celery. Robust and functional admin panel.

list.title: BusNow
list.description: Public transportation app with interactive map and real-time tracking.
list.details: Allows you to estimate bus arrivals, plan routes, and optimize journeys. Uses MapBox and Google Maps for motion simulation and route calculation.

list.title: LiveChat
list.details: Instant message updates, simple interface, and real-time database connection. Developed as a technical test.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have worked as a FrontEnd Developer in companies in Panama and the United States, in addition to personal projects such as Full-Stack. My experience includes creating scalable web applications, developing intuitive interfaces and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams.

list.title: Proactive Health Technologies
list.details: I developed a telemedicine SaaS platform to display clinical information in a secure and seamless way. I worked in the middle layer to transform backend data into frontend deployable data.

list.title: Fundación Ayudinga
list.details: Implemented more than 10 reusable components using TypeScript and Sass, improving the visual and functional consistency of the core platform.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm Edward Pérez, a full-stack developer from Chiriquí, Panamá. I have over two years of experience developing modern interfaces and robust web applications using React, TypeScript, and Python. I've worked on SaaS projects, API integrations, and efficient systems design. I enjoy solving real-world problems with technology, collaborating with diverse teams, and continuing to learn every day to add value through code.
